title: Best iPhone 8 Cases: All the finest cases for your phone | Trusted Reviews
description:
![iPhone 8
deals](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg) iPhone 8 and iPhone 8 Plus

  * [iPhone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/tag/iphone)

The [iPhone 8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/iphone-8-release-date-
specs-rumours-price-uk-2993101) has officially been revealed, and those
looking to pick up the new device on September 22 will likely want a snazzy
case to go with it.

Well, _Trusted Reviews_ has just the thing, and we’ve rounded up some of the
best iPhone cases that will be available at launch.

**Related:[iPhone X Revealed](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/iphone-x-
release-date-specs-features-uk-price-2951157)**

**Snakehive Pastel Collection**

Snakehive has an extensive range of protective cases launching alongside the
iPhone 8. Made with real leather, this is a material that feels great and acts
as a good, durable layer for the device.

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

## Latest

  * 

Prices are yet to be confirmed, but you can check them out on the [**Snakehive
website**](https://www.snakehive.co.uk/) at launch.

**Buy Now: Snakehive Pastel Collection from[Amazon.co.uk
(£20)](http://amzn.to/2fgIEgz) | [Amazon.com ($26) ](http://amzn.to/2xXjH5d)**

**X-Doria Dash Case**

This thin and transparent case looks relatively lightweight and convenient,
protecting your device from scratches without completely hiding away its
natural colour. A nice, thin and seemingly durable case that’s also fitted
with an attractive leather back.

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-
placeholder-3.svg)![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

While not yet available to purchase, the dash case is set to retail for
$39.99.

**Buy Now: X-Doria Dash Case from[Amazon.co.uk (£20](http://amzn.to/2yhXbjl))
| [Amazon.com ($34.99) ](http://amzn.to/2wGS1Rz)**

**X-Doria Defense Clear Case**

Yet another product from X-Doria, this one is a little bit chunkier than
previous efforts, but also comes in a range of different colours and styles.

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-
placeholder-3.svg)![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

The military-grade, aluminium frame will be available in Rose Gold, Black, Red
and Iridescent upon the iPhone 8 launch for $24.99.

**Buy Now: X-Doria Defense Clear Case from[Amazon.co.uk
(£27.99)](http://amzn.to/2xWHySi) | [Amazon.com ($24.99)
](http://amzn.to/2yvVqA3)**

**Ted Baker Collection**

Designed with cutting-edge construction and durable protection in mind, the
Ted Baker Collection features a range of cute designs for iPhone 8 and iPhone
8 Plus.

**Buy Now: Ted Baker Collection from[Amazon.co.uk
(£35)](http://amzn.to/2ffeB8V) | [Amazon.com ($35.99)
](http://amzn.to/2yvs9W2)**

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-
placeholder-3.svg)![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Available from [Proporta](https://www.proporta.co.uk/) upon the iPhone 8
launch on September 22, you can pick one up from £29.95.

**Related:[iPhone 9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/iphone-9-release-
date-specs-features-price-rumours-uk-3297160)**

**We’ll be adding more cases in the future, so be sure to keep this page
bookmarked!**
